text:
Question / Idea

We're building out a lot of pages that are gated with membership, Just a thought/ or question aboud functionality. If we choose for a list to hold membership for a page, It would be great if the list being added to the staged page would NOT send an email to the list until the page is published.

Has this been thought of or could this be setup?

This would make it really smooth for building out the membership site without showing published content until "gating" notifications are ready.

ALSO:
Noticed in Google Search Console that pages make it into the sitemap that are membership based and hubdb and show up as soft 404's
Hello HubSpot Support Team, here is a weird one. When I view my contact on the left sidebar under list memberships i see this:
Agree on the email sends.  We're going to have someone fix that right up.  On the sitemap issue, this is something we have under investigation as well.
Yikes.  Would you mind DM'ing me your portal and a test contact so I can pass it along?
